      • logEvents

        public void logEvents(java.io.PrintStream logTo)
        Enable logging on this EventBus
        Parameters:
        logTo - The PrintStream to which logging is to be done.

      • addListener

        public <T extends Event> void addListener(java.lang.Class<T> type,
                                          java.util.function.Consumer<T> listener,
                                          EventPriority p)
        Register a listener for the given class of event
        Parameters:
        type - The type of event to be checked for
        listener - What should be done when the event occurs
        p - The priority of the listener- high priority listeners are executed before low priority ones

      • addListener

        public <T extends Event> void addListener(java.lang.Class<T> type,
                                          java.util.function.Consumer<T> listener)
        Register a listener for the given class of event, at the default priority level
        Parameters:
        type - The type of event to be checked for
        listener - What should be done when the event occurs

      • post

        public void post(Event e)
        Submit an event to this bus, invoking in a separate thread any listeners assigned to that event class
        Parameters:
        e - The event to be submitted

      • postAll

        public static void postAll(Event e,
                           java.lang.Iterable<EventBus> buses)
        Submit the specified event to all of the specified EventBus instances, in order
        Parameters:
        e - The event to be submitted
        buses - The EventBus instances to receive the event
